(Simplified: 鲋)
Chinese Definition:
①即“鯽魚”：涸澈之鮒(喻處在困難中急待援助的人)。
②蝦蟆：“井谷射鮒”。

鮒字的汉语字典释义

(1)鲫鱼。
(2)虾蟆。
(3)通“附”。

鮒字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮒； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1468第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?符遇切，音附。【說文】魚名。【博雅】鰿也。【爾雅翼】鮒，鰿也。今作鯽。【易·井卦】井谷射鮒。【釋文】子夏傳謂蝦蟇。【儀禮·士昏禮】魚用鮒。【疏】義取夫婦相依附者也。【戰國策】所謂無雉兔鮒魚者也。【註】鮒魚，魚之小者。【莊子·外物篇】車轍有鮒魚焉。【酉陽雜俎】洞庭之鮒。陸佃曰：此魚好旅行，吹沫如星，以相卽謂之鯽，以相附謂之鮒。【劉劭·七華】洞庭之鮒，出於江岷，紅腴靑顱，朱尾碧鱗。又【集韻】蓬逋切，音蒲。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲋; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1468 No. 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Fu Yuqie, with sound attached. [Said the text] The name of the fish. [Bo Ya] Kai also. [Erya Wing] Crucian carp, 鰿 also. This is a crucian carp. [Easy·Jing Gua] Jinggu shoots crucian carp. 【Explanation】Zixia Chuan said that the prawns. 【Ritual·Shihunli】Crucian for fish. [Sparse] Righteousness takes the couple who depend on each other. [Warring States Policy] The so-called no pheasant, rabbit or carp. [Note] Crucian carp, the smallest fish. [Zhuangzi·Foreign Objects] There are crucian carp fish in the ruts. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】The crucian carp of Dongting. Lu Dian said: This fish is good for travel, blowing foam like a star. It is called crucian carp by its phase, and crucian carp by its attached. [Liu Shao·Qihua] The crucian carp of Dongting, from Jiangmin, has red belly and red tail and green scales. [Jiyun] Pengpu cut, sound Pu. The same meaning.
